title: Dark chocolate and raspberry cake
ingredients: ["500g quality dark chocolate (don't skimp on the cheap stuff - it just isn't worth it!)Aim for at least 60% cocoa solids", '200g butter, cut into pieces', '600ml double cream', '85g self-raising flour', '85g plain flour', '1/4 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '200g light muscovado sugar', '200g caster sugar', '25g cocoa powderc', '3 eggs', '1 tablespoon instant coffee granules', '1 small pinch salt', '1 punnet raspberries', 'several tablespoons seedless raspberry jam', '3 boxes CadburyÂ® Chocolate Fingers or similar']
